SurvivabilityPCE¶

public class SurvivabilityPCE¶

Created by jeremy on 7/27/16.

Methods¶

computeSurvivableERO¶

public Map<String, List<TopoEdge>> computeSurvivableERO(RequestedVlanPipeE requestPipe, List<ReservedBandwidthE> rsvBwList, List<ReservedVlanE> rsvVlanList)¶

Depends on BhandariPCE to construct the survivable physical-layer EROs for a request after pruning the topology based on requested parameters

Parameters:
  • requestPipe – Requested pipe with required reservation parameters
Throws:
  • PCEException –
Returns:

A four- element Map containing both the primary and secondary link-disjoint forward-direction EROs and the primary and secondary link-disjoint reverse-direction EROs
